ARABIC: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأْتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Allah will bring it to you if He wills and you will not be able to prevent it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He replied: "Only God will bring it on you if He please, and you cannot prevail against Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Noah said: 'Only Allah will bring it upon you if He so wills, and you will be utterly unable to frustrate that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Noah) replied, "God will bring torment down on you whenever He wants and you will not be able to make His (plans) fail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Allah will surely bring that upon you if He wills, and you will not be able to escape.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Only Allah will bring it (the punishment) on you, if He wills, and then you will escape not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Allah only will bring it to you if He please, and you will not escape:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'God will bring you it if He will; you cannot frustrate Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Only Allah will bring it upon you if He will, and ye can by no means escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "It is God who will bring it down upon you, if He wishes, and you will not be able to escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: only Allah will bring it on you if He will, and ye shall not escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Allah will indeed bring it on you if He wishes, and you cannot frustrate [Him].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Truly, Allah will bring it on you if He wills,- and then, ye will not be able to frustrate it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Only Allah will bring it (the punishment) on you, if He will, and then you will escape not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He replied: 'Allah will bring it (down) upon you if He will; you will never frustrate Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “It is God who will bring it upon you, if He wills, and you will not be able to escape.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Allah will only bring it to you if He wills, and you will not cause [Him] failure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:33] He said, ‘Only God will bring it upon you, if He wills, to hasten it on for you, for the decision is His, not mine; and you cannot escape Him, elude God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Noah said: (Only Allah will bring it Upon you) he said: the One who will bring chastisement on you is Allah (if He will) to punish you, (and ye can by no means escape) His chastisement.
